derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek kautērion 'branding iron' (see cauterize)

means.word_mean: 1. an instrument or substance used to destroy tissue for medical reasons (eg removal of a wart) by burning it with a hot iron or an electric current or a caustic or by freezing it
2. the act of coagulating blood and destroying tissue with a hot iron or caustic agent or by freezing
